titleStmt.title: The history of the houses of Douglas and Angus written by Master David Hume ...
titleStmt.author: Hume, David, 1560?-1630?

notesStmt.note: Caption title: The history of the hovse and race of Douglas and Angus.
Second part has special t.p.: The second part of The history of the Douglasses : containing the House of Angus. 1643.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
